message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get a better deal.
I understand you're looking for a compromise, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $132. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to save a bit more. I'd be willing to pay $128 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $129. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. I'd be willing to pay $127 for the product. This is my final offer, so please let me know if you can accept it.

I understand this is your final offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at the middle of my previous offer and your final offer. I can offer it to you for $128. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
